QuestData.Title: Not In the Face!
QuestData.Description: Alright $n, I was thinking about what we'd try next if the whole gong thing didn't work, and it came to me just like that! Water in the face always worked on me. It's got to be twice as effective for someone so dry and earthy!$B$BMind going over and asking Shu, the spirit of water, if he'll help us out? He should be playing in the pool next to the waterfall, just on the other side of that tree.
QuestData.LogDescription: Request Shu's help in waking Wugou, the spirit of earth.
